name: TextDrawSetShadow
notes: The shadow can be cut by the box area if the size is set too big for the area.
tips: If you want to change the shadow of a textdraw that is already shown, you don't have to recreate it. Simply use TextDrawShowForPlayer/TextDrawShowForAll after modifying the textdraw and the change will be visible.
description: Sets the size of a textdraw's text's shadow.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to set the shadow size of.

params_body.name: size
params_body.description: The size of the shadow. 1 is generally used for a normal shadow size. 0 disables the shadow completely.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The textdraw does not exist.
